price: (10) "That is for what your hands have put forth and because Allāh is not ever unjust to [His] servants."
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِمَا قَدَّمَتۡ يَدَاكَ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَيۡسَ بِظَلَّٰمٖ لِّلۡعَبِيدِ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: dhālika bimā qaddamat yadāka wa-anna al-laha laysa biẓallāmin lil'ʿabīdi
